main_definition: People who freely offer their time, skills, or services to help others without expecting payment in return.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals willing to give their own free time for a cause they believe in
meanings_and_examples.example: The volunteers at the animal shelter work tirelessly to care for abandoned pets.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of people who choose to contribute their skills and labor without pay
meanings_and_examples.example: The band of musicians volunteered to play at the charity event, entertaining guests throughout the night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: People who offer services or aid in community projects or organizations
meanings_and_examples.example: Volunteers helped organize a neighborhood clean-up day and collected trash from streets and parks.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person or members of an organization that offers help without being paid for it, often to support charitable causes
meanings_and_examples.example: The local food bank relies on volunteers to sort, pack, and distribute donations to those in need.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals who give their time or skills out of altruism or a desire to contribute positively
meanings_and_examples.example: The group of students volunteered at the hospital, visiting patients and bringing smiles during challenging times.
